DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study compare effect kidney function perform removal kidney tumor without clamp blood vessel surgery .
DOC.criteria: Patients 18 old . Patients willing able sign consent . Patients organ confine renal mass planning undergo robotic assist partial nephrectomy ( RAPN ) . Patient Karnofsky Performance Status ( KPS ) equal great 40 . Patients 18 . Patients Karnofsky Performance Status ( KPS ) less 40 . Patients nonorgan confine renal mass ( invade renal vein , inferior vena cava , perirenal tissue , ipsilateral adrenal gland , metastasis ) . Patients bilateral synchronous renal mass . Patients discontinue Plavix , Coumadin antiplatelet anticoagulant medication . Patients renal lesion determine complex perform RAPN without clamp surgeon . ( The renal mass may deem difficult base preoperatively radiological finding . The surgeon 's decision exclude mass robotic assist partial nephrectomy would base high risk positive margin complication RAPN perform . )
